item.title: It is time Bangladesh pursued inclusive growth
item.description: Emerging from the ruins of the war of independence in 1971 with a devastated economy, Bangladesh has gradually transformed into a vibrant lower-middle-income country.

item.title: Is climate change intensifying fires in Bangladesh?
item.description: Bangladesh is facing a growing fire crisis. Data from the Department of Fire Service and Civil Defence, compiled by Dataful, shows roughly 250,000 fires occurred nationwide between 1997 and 2018.

item.title: Election manifestoes must go beyond rhetoric
item.description: Sadly, education is one area that political parties often fail to prioritise in their election manifestoes beyond, of course, routine and vague pledges.
